text: Abdelouahed Belkeziz, (; ; 5 July 1939 â€“ 19 October 2021) was a Moroccan lawyer, politician, and diplomat. He was the eighth Secretary-General of the Organisation of the Islamic Conference (OIC) from 2001 to 2004.
